summary: RDMA/siw: Fix refcounting leak in siw_create_qp()
details:
RDMA/siw: Fix refcounting leak in siw_create_qp()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.22 by commit 2989ba9532babac66e79997ccff73c015b69700c, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 514aee660df493cd673154a6ba6bab745ec47b8c. For more details please see the references link.
